<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update contact address information"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/contact/{contactid:[0-9]+}/addressdata/{id:[0-9]+}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the contact address information with the parameter specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"description":"Contact information record ID","type":"integer"},"contactid":{"description":"Contact ID","type":"integer"},"address":{"description":"New address data"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Contact information with the updated address","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"InfoType":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","enum":["Phone","Email","Website","Skype","Twitter","LinkedIn","Facebook","Address","LiveJournal","MySpace","GMail","Blogger","Yahoo","MSN","ICQ","Jabber","AIM","VK"],"description":"[0 - Phone, 1 - Email, 2 - Website, 3 - Skype, 4 - Twitter, 5 - LinkedIn, 6 - Facebook, 7 - Address, 8 - LiveJournal, 9 - MySpace, 10 - GMail, 11 - Blogger, 12 - Yahoo, 13 - MSN, 14 - ICQ, 15 - Jabber, 16 - AIM, 17 - VK]","example":"1"},"Category":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"0"},"Data":{"type":"string","example":"support@onlyoffice.com"},"CategoryName":{"type":"string","example":"Home"},"IsPrimary":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"},"ID":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"}},"title":"ContactInfoWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
